data.title: Houston Symphony Jobs & Careers
data.meta_description: The Houston Symphony is a non-profit organization and offers exciting career opportunities and benefits. View roles currently available and apply to experience a rewarding career in Houston.
data.text:
HOUSTON SYMPHONY AUDITIONS

The Houston Symphony announces auditions for the following full-time positions. To apply, please use the application procedure detailed below.

ASSOCIATE PRINCIPAL AND E-FLAT CLARINET (one position)

Audition Dates: Preliminary and Semifinal Rounds on November 2, 4, 5, 2024, Final Round on December 2, 2024

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: September 23, 2024

Cancellation Deadline: October 18, 2024

• Audition Repertoire to be available soon.

ASSOCIATE CONCERTMASTER

Audition Dates: Preliminary, Semifinal and Final Rounds on January 11, 13, 2025; Final Round on February 4 – 5, 2025

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: November 18, 2024

Cancellation Deadline: December 20, 2024

• Audition Repertoire to be available soon.

ASSISTANT PRINCIPAL DOUBLE BASS

Audition Dates: Preliminary and Semifinal Rounds on February 10-11, 2025, Final Rounds on February 12, 2025

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: December 9, 2024

Cancellation Deadline: January 27, 2025

• Audition Repertoire to be available soon.

PRINCIPAL KEYBOARD

Audition Dates: Preliminary and Semifinal Rounds on February 23 – 25, 2025,

Final Rounds on March 18 – 19, 2025

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: January 7, 2025

Cancellation Deadline: February 9, 2025

• Audition Repertoire to be available soon.

HOUSTON SYMPHONY AUDITIONS FOR SUBSTITUTE AND EXTRA MUSICIANS

The Houston Symphony Announces Audition for Per Service Substitute and Extra Musicians for the following instruments. To apply, please use application procedure detailed at the bottom the page

DOUBLE BASS SUBSTITUTE AND EXTRA

Audition Date: September 30, 2024

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: September 9, 2024

• CLICK HERE FOR AUDITION REPERTOIRE

TROMBONE and TUBA SUBSTITUTE AND EXTRA

Audition Date: October 28, 2024

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: October 7, 2024

• CLICK HERE FOR AUDITION REPERTOIRE

TIMPANI SUBSTITUTE AND EXTRA

Audition Date: November 20, 2024

Auditions to be held at Jones Hall for the Performing Arts, Houston.

Applications must be received by: October 30, 2024

• CLICK HERE FOR AUDITION REPERTOIRE

APPLICATION PROCEDURE

To be considered for an invitation to audition, highly qualified candidates should submit an audition application, to be received no later than the indicated date.

Please complete the audition application form linked below and email your audition application to: hssauditions@houstonsymphony.org

Audition Application – Resumé Form

Please indicate the name of the position for which you are applying in the subject line of the email.

No phone calls please.

The audition committee reserves the right to dismiss any candidate not meeting the highest artistic standards.

The Houston Symphony is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

EMPLOYMENT

The Houston Symphony has a 52-week season which includes 9 weeks of paid vacation with a minimum annual salary of $109,200 for the 2024-25 contract year for all permanent musicians. Benefits include health/dental/vision insurance, instrument insurance, disability insurance, and pension contributions to the AFM-EPF.com

Successful candidates from the Houston Symphony substitute and extra musician auditions will be placed on the substitute pool list for possible engagement with the orchestra as needed. Substitute and extra musicians are engaged on per-service basis at the rate of $210.00, as of October 6, 2024.
